jd: From: Vinit, Simplify Software Experts vinit@simplifysoftwareexperts.com Reply to: vinit@simplifysoftwareexperts.com Role : .Net developerLocation : Farmington Hills, Michigan (Onsite)Contract to hire : 6 months Client domain : manufacturer and automobile wiring harness systemsWe are looking Manufacturing exp mustResponsibilities:Design, develop, and maintain reliable, scalable, and secure applications using C# and .NET frameworkParticipate in the entire application life cycle, focusing on coding, debugging, and testingCollaborate with internal teams to produce software design and architectureDevelop documentation throughout the software development life cycle (SDLC)Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code in accordance with best practices and established coding standardsImplement effective and secure functionality in applicationsPerform thorough testing to ensure software runs smoothly and meets client needsTroubleshoot, debug, and upgrade existing softwareGather and evaluate user feedback to enhance application performanceRecommend and execute improvements to current programming procedures and processesCandidate’s Profile:Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or similar experienceProven experience as a C# Developer or Application DeveloperFamiliarity with the ASP.NET framework and SQL ServerFamiliarity with architecture styles/APIs (e.g., REST)Understanding of Agile methodologiesExcellent problem-solving and critical thinking skillsStrong communication and teamwork skillsFamiliarity with continuous integrationThanks & RegardsVinit Kumar MauryaE: vinit@simplifysoftwareexperts.com A: 8,The Green,Suite A, Dover, Delaware -19901 United StatesW: https://simplifysoftwareexperts.com/ L: https://www.linkedin.com/in/vinit-kumar-maurya-17b732230/
